Added a transaction search function. Supports searching posted and pending transactions by entering keyword or amount, and/or by using filters for date, Envelope, and Account.
Added a transaction search function. Supports searching posted and pending transactions by entering keyword or amount, and/or by using filters for date, Envelope, and Account.
Minor fixes to logic of the "save location" toggle when adding/editing transactions.
Minor fixes to logic of the "save location" toggle when adding/editing transactions.

Streamlined the process of adding transactions. Tapping the the add transaction button on the upper-right of the Envelopes, Transactions, and Accounts tabs now allows creation of all types of transactions (Expenses/Credits, Incomes, Fills from Unallocated, and Envelope/Account Transfers). Incomes, Fills, and Transfers are no longer added through the More tab.

Notes can also now be added to Envelope/Account Transfers, and any Notes created on Transfers through the web app should now be visible.

Streamlined the process of adding transactions. Tapping the the add transaction button on the upper-right of the Envelopes, Transactions, and Accounts tabs now allows creation of all types of transactions (Expenses/Credits, Incomes, Fills from Unallocated, and Envelope/Account Transfers). Incomes, Fills, and Transfers are no longer added through the More tab.

Notes can also now be added to Envelope/Account Transfers, and any Notes created on Transfers through the web app should now be visible.
Fixed a bug preventing Payees from being edited on posted transactions.
Fixed a bug preventing Payees from being edited on posted transactions.
Added new dark mode theme.
Added new dark mode theme.
Added new Debt Progress Report, for tracking past payoff progress and future payoff projection.
Added new Debt Progress Report, for tracking past payoff progress and future payoff projection.
Added two new transaction types (Debt Payment and Interest, Fee, New Charge), allowing debt transactions to be created on the go.
Added two new transaction types (Debt Payment and Interest, Fee, New Charge), allowing debt transactions to be created on the go.
Added the ability to add and edit Debt Accounts, and fixed some other minor Debt-related bugs. All Debt features can now be fully accessed from within the app.
Added the ability to add and edit Debt Accounts, and fixed some other minor Debt-related bugs. All Debt features can now be fully accessed from within the app.

Added the ability to add and edit Debt Accounts, and fixed some other minor Debt-related bugs. All Debt features can now be fully accessed from within the app. Also resolved an issue with crashing for certain households.

Added the ability to add and edit Debt Accounts, and fixed some other minor Debt-related bugs. All Debt features can now be fully accessed from within the app. Also resolved an issue with crashing for certain households.
Updated a link, fixed a bug preventing certain Interest rates on Debt Accounts, and added messaging to make it easier to Fill new Envelopes once they're created.
Updated a link, fixed a bug preventing certain Interest rates on Debt Accounts, and added messaging to make it easier to Fill new Envelopes once they're created.
Fixed an issue with the date selector and fixed a problem causing certain households to forget and re-register devices on the first sync of a new day.
Fixed an issue with the date selector and fixed a problem causing certain households to forget and re-register devices on the first sync of a new day.
Updated some code on the back end to keep the app future proof and fixed a bug with the labelling of the Schedule button.
Updated some code on the back end to keep the app future proof and fixed a bug with the labelling of the Schedule button.
Addressed some crashing issues.
Addressed some crashing issues.

Multi-period Envelope support! All types of Envelope (such as Every 2 Months, Goal, etc) can now be created and edited through the app directly. Additionally, the Add Income and Fill from Unallocated transactions have been updated with 1) a new option that allows you to Fill every Envelope at once, and 2) new balance bars that make it easier to visualize how much you're Filling. [new from 4.0]: Fixed an issue where Envelopes would show green bars even if their balances weren't positive.

Multi-period Envelope support! All types of Envelope (such as Every 2 Months, Goal, etc) can now be created and edited through the app directly. Additionally, the Add Income and Fill from Unallocated transactions have been updated with 1) a new option that allows you to Fill every Envelope at once, and 2) new balance bars that make it easier to visualize how much you're Filling. [new from 4.0]: Fixed an issue where Envelopes would show green bars even if their balances weren't positive.

Multi-period Envelope support! All types of Envelope (such as Every 3 Months, Goal, etc) can now be created and edited through the app directly. Additionally, the Add Income and Fill from Unallocated transactions have been updated with 1) a new option that allows you to Fill every Envelope at once, and 2) new balance bars that make it easier to visualize how much you're Filling. [new from 4.0]: Fixed an issue where Envelopes would show green bars even if their balances weren't positive. Fixed an issue where the Fill screen would not show the correct information for households with Accounts turned off.

Multi-period Envelope support! All types of Envelope (such as Every 3 Months, Goal, etc) can now be created and edited through the app directly. Additionally, the Add Income and Fill from Unallocated transactions have been updated with 1) a new option that allows you to Fill every Envelope at once, and 2) new balance bars that make it easier to visualize how much you're Filling. [new from 4.0]: Fixed an issue where Envelopes would show green bars even if their balances weren't positive. Fixed an issue where the Fill screen would not show the correct information for households with Accounts turned off.

Multi-period Envelope support! All types of Envelope (such as Every 3 Months, Goal, etc) can now be created and edited through the app directly. Additionally, the Add Income and Fill from Unallocated transactions have been updated with 1) a new option that allows you to Fill every Envelope at once, and 2) new balance bars that make it easier to visualize how much you're Filling. [new since 4.0]: Fixed an issue where Envelopes would show green bars even if their balances weren't positive. Fixed an issue where the Fill screen would not show the correct information for households with Accounts turned off. Fixed an issue where the Rollover toggle wouldn't update the Fill option.

Multi-period Envelope support! All types of Envelope (such as Every 3 Months, Goal, etc) can now be created and edited through the app directly. Additionally, the Add Income and Fill from Unallocated transactions have been updated with 1) a new option that allows you to Fill every Envelope at once, and 2) new balance bars that make it easier to visualize how much you're Filling. [new since 4.0]: Fixed an issue where Envelopes would show green bars even if their balances weren't positive. Fixed an issue where the Fill screen would not show the correct information for households with Accounts turned off. Fixed an issue where the Rollover toggle wouldn't update the Fill option.

- EEBA is now Goodbudget
